channel.title: Comments on: Reflections on EARCOS Teachers Conference 2012 – Friday
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Doug Johnson
item.dc:creator: Doug Johnson
item.description:
Thanks, Evan. I'm glad you got something from the workshop. The EARCOS teachers were a great group with which to work.
Doug
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Evan. I’m glad you got something from the workshop. The EARCOS teachers were a great group with which to work.

Doug
